author: Firdose Moonda
title: Dane Piedt ends South Africa career to chase American dream
description: Offspinner, who played nine Tests for South Africa, has signed up for new 'minor league' T20 competition | ESPNcricinfo.com
content:
Dane Piedt, the nine-times capped South African Test offspinner, still harbours hopes of playing at a 50-over World Cup, albeit not for the country of his birth.
Piedt will move to the USA in the next few months to be part of the new Minor League T20 tournam… [+6412 chars]
